name: React Clicky Game
description: A memory game where the user has to click each of the twelve Spiderman costumes only once. The images shuffle on click which makes it harder than it looks. The users previous high score is saved when they lose a game, and will not update until they beat their last high score.

name: GameScraper
description: This application allows a user to scrape theverge.com/games for current gaming news. The user can then save the info toe a mongo database, and add notes or comments to the article. The user may also delete their notes or the saved articles.

name: NYT React
description: An application that utilizes the New York Times API to pull articles from the users choice of topic and date range. The user can then save an article to a mongo database, or delete the article.

name: One Stop Code Shop - Forum
description: A site that allows users to communicate with each other through forum posts and a chat. Please use demo and demo as login info to view the site. I worked on the overall handlebars set up for each page and the routing to connect mySQL to the site.

name: Friend Finder
description: An application where a user can answer questions to connect with another user with similar interests. Information is stored in a json file which is then compared to the users form inputs.

name: One Stop Code Shop
description: A site for coders to search for answers to a question all on one page. Press the Youtube and Stack Overflow icons at the top, press a radio button for one of the coding languages, and then input your related question in the search bar. The responses will show up below.

name: Overwatch RPG
description: The app begins with the user selecting a map and a hero. The user then chooses their opponent as they fight their way to victory or defeat.

name: Parks & Rec Trivia Game
description: A trivia game that can stump the biggest Parks & Recreations fan.

name: Giphy Generator
description: An application that allows the user to input their favorite superhero, which will create a button. After clicking this button, new gifs will generate on the page. These gifs will start on click and pause when they are clicked a second time.

name: Battle Royale Hangman
description: A word guess game using battle royale game titles. Guess the game and you will see an image and short blurb about it.

name: Train Scheduler
description: An application that allows you to add trains and their schedules to a firebase database. The application will then tell you when the next train is coming depending on the current time.
